text:
Heads up: Few days ago I made new W11 GPOs for different OUs. Seems setting
"Specify source service for the following classes of Windows Update" in
combination with WSUS isn't a good idea. Even setting "Other Updates" and
"Features" to "Windowsupdate" end in 0x800f0950 when trying to install SNMP
feature via PowerShell. Setting the GPO to "Not configured" makes the error go
away. Markus --
Link: None

metadata.topic: Setting a service source prevents ading a feature like SNMP
metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] Setting a service source prevents ading a feature like SNMP
